mapper.sql: MASTER.ID AS MASTER_ID, MASTER.CODE AS MASTER_CODE, MASTER.NAME AS MASTER_NAME, MASTER.TYPE AS MASTER_TYPE, MASTER.ACTIVE AS MASTER_ACTIVE, MASTER.BEGIN_TIME AS MASTER_BEGIN_TIME, MASTER.END_TIME AS MASTER_END_TIME, MASTER.DESCRIPTION AS MASTER_DESCRIPTION, MASTER.VERSION_NO AS MASTER_VERSION_NO, MASTER.NATION_CODE AS MASTER_NATION_CODE, MASTER.PROV_CODE AS MASTER_PROV_CODE, MASTER.CITY_CODE AS MASTER_CITY_CODE, MASTER.COUNTY_CODE AS MASTER_COUNTY_CODE, MASTER.CREATE_USER_CODE AS MASTER_CREATE_USER_CODE, MASTER.MODIFY_USER_CODE AS MASTER_MODIFY_USER_CODE, MASTER.CREATE_TIME AS MASTER_CREATE_TIME, MASTER.MODIFY_TIME AS MASTER_MODIFY_TIME, MASTER.CREATE_ORG_CODE AS MASTER_CREATE_ORG_CODE, MASTER.MODIFY_ORG_CODE AS MASTER_MODIFY_ORG_CODE

ID, T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_ID, T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_CODE, INCLUDE_ORG_ID, INCLUDE_ORG_CODE, ACTIVE, CREATE_USER_CODE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_ORG_CODE, VERSION_NO, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME
mapper.select:
SELECT /** 综合-价格-根据名称查询增值价格区域 **/
FROM pkp.t_srv_valueadd_region MASTER
MASTER.NAME = #{regionName}
ORDER BY MASTER.MODIFY_TIME DESC

SELECT /** 综合-价格-根据ID查询增值价格区域 **/ DISTINCT
FROM pkp.t_srv_valueadd_region MASTER
MASTER.ID = #{id}
ORDER BY MASTER.MODIFY_TIME DESC
mapper.sql: ID, CODE, NAME, TYPE, ACTIVE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, DESCRIPTION, VERSION_NO, NATION_CODE, PROV_CODE, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_ORG_CODE
mapper.update:
UPDATE /** 综合-价格-根据ID选择性修改增值价格区域 **/ pkp.t_srv_valueadd_region T
T.CODE = #{regionCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.NAME = #{regionName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.TYPE = #{regionType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.ACTIVE = #{active, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
T.BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T.END_TIME = #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T.DESCRIPTION = #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.VERSION_NO = #{versionNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
T.MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.MODIFY_ORG_CODE = #{modifyOrgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.NATION_CODE = #{nationCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.PROV_CODE = #{proCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.CITY_CODE = #{cityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.MODIFY_TIME = sysdate,
WHERE T.ID = #{id}
mapper.sql: ID, T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_ID, T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_CODE, INCLUDE_ORG_ID, INCLUDE_ORG_CODE, ACTIVE, CREATE_USER_CODE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_ORG_CODE, VERSION_NO, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME
mapper.update:
UPDATE /** 综合-价格-批量修改增值价格区域和部门 **/ pkp.t_srv_valueadd_region_org T
T.BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T.END_TIME = #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T.VERSION_NO = #{versionNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
T.MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.MODIFY_ORG_CODE = #{modifyOrgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.MODIFY_TIME = sysdate,
T.ACTIVE = #{active, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE T.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO /** 综合-价格-插入增值价格区域和部门 **/ pkp.t_srv_valueadd_region_org(
) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceRegionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceRegionCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{includeOrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{includeOrgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{createOrgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{modifyOrgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.sql: MASTER.ID AS MASTER_ID, MASTER.T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_CODE AS MASTER_REGIONCODE, MASTER.T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_ID AS MASTER_REGIONID, MASTER.INCLUDE_ORG_ID AS MASTER_ORGID, MASTER.INCLUDE_ORG_CODE AS MASTER_ORGCODE, MASTER.ACTIVE AS MASTER_ACTIVE, MASTER.VERSION_NO AS VERSION_NO, MASTER.BEGIN_TIME AS MASTER_BEGINTIME, MASTER.END_TIME AS MASTER_ENDTIME, MASTER.CREATE_USER_CODE AS CREATE_USER_CODE, MASTER.MODIFY_USER_CODE AS MODIFY_USER_CODE, MASTER.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, MASTER.MODIFY_TIME AS MODIFY_TIME, MASTER.CREATE_ORG_CODE AS CREATE_ORG_CODE
